data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Modern technology is creating a single, global culture. Do you agree or disagree? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: In today's world, the use of technology is ever increasing. I totally agree that contemporary technology is gradually creating a single world culture. The most important reason is the widespread of the Internet, through which people can communicate easily with others who are far away and exchange ideas with each other, which makes them influenced by the same culture regardless of their nationality. Moreover, a trip to a foreign country becomes easier due to the development of transportation technology. In conclusion, the development of modern technology has brought people all over the world closer and contributed to a single, global culture. (101字)
